name: Moto Drag Racing
description:
Moto Drag Racing is a fast paced motorcycle drag racing game where you control a number of super bikes against another racer

Race, speed, and sprint your way through a number of circuits in the best mobile motorbike game, Motorbike Racing - Moto Racer!

Take your motorbike and race against other bikers and win races to unlock more levels and use the touch screen to control your motorbike as you race other riders to the finish line!

Upgrade your motorcycle with more powerful accessories to ensure you remain competitive and don’t get left on the start line

If you love racing games then you are in for a treat.

FEATURES:

- Advanced bike physics for the most realistic racing on mobile
- Addictive gameplay.
- Simple one-finger controls optimised for touch screen
- Realistic racing physics and intelligent AI means you have to be one step ahead of the rest.
- Working on more levels
